: after installing the ndiswrapper how do i use it to clearfy it as the driver for my wireless card...
: after installing the ndiswrapper how do i use it to clearfy it as the driver for my wireless card...

well, as it says in there, you need to point it to your driver's inf file with sudo ndiswrapper -i /path/to/driver, first, then do sudo ndiswrapper -l (it *should* say "Driver present, hardware present" or something like that), then sudo ndiswrapper -m, then sudo modprobe ndiswrapper...
then take down your wired interface (sudo ifdown eth0) and bring up your wireless (sudo ifup wlan0)
if any of that needs clarifying, i'd be glad to do so :-)
